name: DailyJingle
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Looking for a bit of nostalgia and fun to break up your daily news and weather report? Then add Daily Jingle! to your Flash Briefing and start your day off with a smile!

Daily Jingle! plays a random vintage radio commercial straight from the golden era of radio and transports you right back to the 1940's and 50's.

Have fun and be prepared to sing!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
